mapper.select: select ai.office_code AREA_CODE, ai.office_name AREA_NAME, ri.room_code ROOM_CODE, ri.room_name ROOM_NAME from room_info ri, area_info ai where ri.area_id = ai.id and ri.area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ri.id = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
